function PercentExp(lvl, Exp:integer):double;
var
 Result:double;
begin
 Result:=0;
 if((lvl>=1)AND(lvl<=85))then Result:= (Exp-exp_table[lvl])/(exp_table[lvl+1]-exp_table[lvl])*100;
 if(Result<0)then Result:=0;
 PercentExp:=Result;
end;
